channel.title: [solved] Compile Error :)

item.title: [solved] Compile Error :)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok hey i managed to fix most of my compile errors.

im stuck with this

i was doing this tut: http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/249862-525-simple-effective-multi-logging-blocker.html

and was adding:

			if(Online == 1) {
			Misc.println("Multi-Logging, Socket has been Close");
			socket.close();
			continue;
			}

under this

 if (checkBanned(getAddress(socket))) {
                    socket.close();
                    continue;
                }

This is the snippit of the whole code:

    public void run() {

        Socket socket = null;
	if (!IOHostList.has(getAddress(socket), 1))) {
        while (serverRunning) {
            try {
                socket = serverChannel.accept();
                socket.setSoTimeout(1);
                socket.setTcpNoDelay(true);
                appendConnection(getAddress(socket));
		Misc.println("Connection recieved from: " + getAddress(socket));
				IOHostList.add(getAddress(socket));
                if (checkBanned(getAddress(socket))) {
                    socket.close();
                    continue;
                }
		if (Online == 1) {
		    Misc.println("Multi-Logging, Socket has been Close");
		    socket.close();
		    continue;
		}
                int id = getFreeId();
                sockets[id] = socket;
                Server.engine.addConnection(socket, id);
            } catch (Exception e) {
            }
        }
    } else {
Misc.println("Connection rejected from: " + getAddress(socket));
return;
}
}

so i know it has to do with the else. because “else” is only 2 options and i added a 3rd.

Read full topic
